io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui

Class StockDisplayPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.AbstractListenerView
      • io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.StockDisplayPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.craigmiller160.mvp.core.PropertyChangeView, io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.ListenerView, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class StockDisplayPanel
extends io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.AbstractListenerView
    GUI component that defines the display panel where stock information appears. Like the Frame, this component has multiple sub components that it displays, and those sub components are in separate classes. It uses a system of placeholder components, combined with setter methods, to allow this class to exist independently of other GUI classes while still incorporating them into its design.

    Like all GUI classes in this program, this class separates its instantiation code from its assembly code for maximum flexibility.

    THREAD SAFETY: Swing is NOT thread safe.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    craig
